content.title: Durghatana Mein Chikitsa Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: 'Chhattisgarh Durghatana Mein Chikitsa Sahaayata Yojana' has been started by the Chhattisgarh Government and manage/run by the Chhattisgarh, Labor Department.
benefits: To the registered beneficiaries, medical assistance of ₹ 20,000/- or the actual expenditure incurred on the treatment, whichever is less, will be provided.
eligibility: The applicant must be a permanent resident of Chhattisgarh state.
It is mandatory for construction workers to be registered in any district.
Must have completed 90 days as a laborer in the board.
content.application_process: Registered construction workers can apply through any CSC center or labor office. Get the application form. Fill out with required details. Attach the necessary documents.

faqs.question: What is the benefits of the scheme?
What is the maximum limit of Financial assistance?
What is the eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: 1. The applicant must be a permanent resident of Chhattisgarh state. 2. It is mandatory for construction workers to be registered in any district.

faqs.question: What is the financial eligibility for the scheme?
faqs.answer: There is no financial eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: Can other state applicant also apply for the scheme benefits?
How to apply for the scholarship?
faqs.answer: 1. Registered construction workers can apply through any CSC center or labor office. 2. Get the application form. 3. Fill out with required details. 4. Attach the necessary documents.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Aadhar card. 2. Permanent residence certificate. 3. Bank account details. 4. Hospital certificate.
